title: Xin zhao and shyvana were premtivley nerfed because they would be too strong with sated devouerer
body: meanwhile {{champion:11}}  can double strike twice, proc wuju style 4 times, and reduce his alpha strike cooldown by 4 seconds in the 1 second it takes for him to attack. Rito plz

replies.body: Shyvana is far more broken than yi at the moment.
At least {{champion:102}} is somewhat kite able. Also doesn't deal 400 true damage per second.
Shyvana is way more tanky though. Not saying Yi isn't a problem, but Shyvana would have been worse. Like a roided out Trundle.

yi can build 
{{item:3153}}, {{item:3931}} and {{item:3031}}  and then full tank.

Still as op as full damage

> [{quoted}](name=Hey I Main Ekko,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZJAExxZF,comment-id=0002000000010000,timestamp=2015-07-10T04:35:49.649+0000)

> {{item:3153}}, {{item:3931}} and {{item:3031}}  and then full tank.

YI CAN BUILD 3 SUPER EXPENSIVE offensive items and then go defense! OPOPOP
Sorry that is just the silliest argument. THe rest is valid
Devourer at 2250 is most definitely not "super expensive". Blade is pretty averagely costed. IE I'll give it to you.
A last whisper would do so much more than IE.

not really, since so much of his DPS is magic and true damage with that build, it's roughly 50% AD, 15% magic, and 35% True damage.

If anything, I'de replace the IE with a phantom dancer or a Youmuu's instead for more attack speed and crit chance (since IE isn't fabulous without other crit items).
50% + 15% + 45%+ = 110% total damage? Did Yi become so broke he destroyed the confines of math?!?!
mistyped, meant 35% true damage.
Compared to {{champion:67}}... utterly broken, proc w every 2 auto attacks.

> [{quoted}](name=SSW Cody,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZJAExxZF,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-07-09T22:55:02.737+0000)
>
> Compared to {{champion:67}}... utterly broken, proc w every 2 auto attacks.

Difference is Vayne is ... kind of not suited to the jungle. If a Vayne jungles and manages to get Sated Devourer then she deserves to proc her W every 2nd attack because she's achieved something.

> [{quoted}](name=MotherTeresa1910,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZJAExxZF,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-07-09T23:47:11.519+0000)
>
> Difference is Vayne is ... kind of not suited to the jungle. If a Vayne jungles and manages to get Sated Devourer then she deserves to proc her W every 2nd attack because she's achieved something.

I just go armor and attack speed and she can clear it pretty easy  also use some tanky masteries
But isn't she really prone to invades? Early she's pretty weak, I imagine Lee Sin would just obliterate her.

> [{quoted}](name=Trias000,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZJAExxZF,comment-id=0003000000010000,timestamp=2015-07-10T09:47:12.178+0000)
>
> But isn't she really prone to invades? Early she's pretty weak, I imagine Lee Sin would just obliterate her.

yeah she is but if you and your team can coordinate *rarely happens in normals I recommend going with friends in a skype call* she can farm relatively safely and with her E she can push away invaders while she q's away that is if you are warding your own jungle but I mean who doesn't? also with her E's stun it can give a relatively good amount of setup time for your mid,bot or top to come over and help secure a kill! But I''m blabbering about teamwork and such when its pretty hard to do in a  game with random people so in reality yeah shes weak against ganks in her own jungle but that's only if your team cant coordinate well enough to ask for help
to be honest,  lee also obliterates Yi in the early...and she can kite most other melee-junglers to death easily.

Edit: nobody understands sarcasm anymore :(
Pretty much applies to all damage based single target auto attackers.

Pretty much applies to all but 6 champions.
{{champion:2}} {{champion:41}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:10}} {{champion:23}} {{champion:78}}
Kayle is still CCable within her ult. Make that 5.
So is {{champion:23}}
but not killable. hence the exemption i guess.

Wow what?

HOW do you forget {{champion:39}} ? Her passive literally reduces CC.

{{champion:36}}  Gets tenacity from W
{{champion:86}}  Gets tenacity from W

CC *reduction* is not CC *immunity* or *removal*.
Hence why they weren't included.
Too bad he can build {{item:3930}} +{{item:3153}}  and then full tank since he doesnt even need the ad anymore.
So basically a CC less fighter, how terrifying.

A CC less fighter who deals 32% of the targets current health plus ~400 true damage plus 2.5 auto attacks worth of damage per second as mixed damage. Also a point and click gapcloser on a 2 second cooldown. Play one game as devouerer yi, you clearly haven't yet.
These numbers, where did you get them from?

Double strike plus auto attack plus devouerer attack plus {{item:3153}} is 32% of the targets current health (slightly less since it is current health so it will decrease but still a lot) + 1.5 (typo on the original) auto attacks worth of damage plus 240 magic damage from 4 devouerer procs plus 400ish true damage (I'm just guessing since I can't accurately tell) and it will reduce alpha strike cd by 4 seconds leaving it at a 2 second cd.

>

That's funny. Good luck trying to cc him when he alpha strikes every other second.
Pretty sure they pulled the Shyvana nerf, and they definitely *tried* to pull the Xin nerf, but didn't get it done in time.
Read the patch notes, they were both nerfed.

http://www.surrenderat20.net/2015/07/patch-513-notes.html

They pulled the Shyvana nerfs.
No, they forgot to put them in the patch notes. They're there on the regular website now.

They updated the patch notes since I read them, looks like the Shyv nerf did go through. And I knew the Xin nerfs were in, but the comment [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/NEqpAePU-so-ap-xin-with-sated-devourer?comment=0000000000000000000000040001) suggests they didn't exactly want it to. Dunno if they'll actually change it back at some point, though.

{{champion:11}}  got a secret nerf. When ever he uses his passive double strike the 2nd strike won't reduce the cooldown of your alpha strike like it used to. But still yi is pretty good right now. I hope riot keeps him this way but he still can be countered by blinds and or hard cc (knockups/stuns) or thornmail. Thornmail is hard for {{champion:11}}

Meh, built Thornmail and took red smite vs a Yi in my past two games and he had no issue fighting me at all. Granted the first game I was Tahm Kench, but the second game I was Aatrox with a sated devourer (plus a few other items). Yet he'd still kill me in seconds because he could do like 800 true damage in 2-3 seconds + he had two lifesteal items and a wits end, which basically negate my thornmail + gromp. He was actually pretty even with me throughout the game, having maybe 1 or 2 more assists/kills. But once he got sated (I did too around the same time) he'd just go into 2-3 people and kill them all. If you were alone vs him you'd die too.

Hard to CC him when he's using alpha strike every few seconds as well, not to mention he's moving fast due to his ultimate (no slows, hard to hit CC skillshots).

Though as FULL tank Tahm Kench was almost capable of beating him in fights, with gromp + thornmail and red smite up, if I had it. But he learned to just ignore me and kill all the other targets first. This Yi also built IE instead of hydra, and had no MR.
and yet Graves can't have a cigar.

Anyone saying Shyvana and Xin are more broken then Yi with this item is pulling it straight out of their anus. Yi can literally 2 shot both of them with his mixture of insane magic and true damage and being an AD hypercarry his physical damage.

So they're preemptively nerfing champs even though they specifically said there would never be preemptive nerfs?

I'm shocked... --_--
tfw no one is noticing ww is a thing :D

Sated Devouerer is just stupid.  It breaks so many champs.  Before as a mid lane I could challenge a 1v1 with the likes of Yi.  Now unless I kill him out right in a combo Im dead.  No amount of items will save me.  I have seen crap Yi's Penta kill on PBE and that should not happen.

Theres a difference though:

Yi is shit in the current meta.

Shyv and Xin are not.

Originally, I too believed that Yi was going to be stupidly overpowered with the release of sated devourer.
However, after a few games as and against him, I realized that he has only become slightly better.

For all those who claim that he is broken and theory crafts his damage, I ask if you have actually played against Yi today.
Yi before Sated Devour or would kill most squishies or tanks if he manages to get on top of them, with sated devourer, he just does it slightly faster.

However, he is still just as Vulnerable to CC and damage as before. Late game, it only takes me 3 AAs from an ADC to kill him. If I am with my teammates, him engaging on me is suicide. Yi can still be stopped the same way he is stopped before. He pretty much runs in a straight line most of the time to close the gap, so just aim your CC at him. 

The only real benefits so far I see from his gameplay is that he can hit his power spike much earlier since Sated Devouror stacks faster, he can fight some tanky champions that he could not before, and that he can solo baron. However, these perks are not exclusive to Yi. Today, I also saw an Udyr and Aatrox solo baron by themselves. As well, they can also handle tanky opponents, and probably in a manner much better than Yi could.

Yi sure do a lot of damage; however, he is still manageable with the right abilities.

Xin Zhao on the other hand has a kit even more mindless than Yi's. Despite Yi's kit's simplicity, Yi must watch when he Alpha strikes to avoid CC or burst, when to Meditate to mitigate the most damage, and when to E and R since his damage falls off when they expire. Xin Zhao just has to decide if he can go in or not, and perhaps when to use his ult.

From season 1, anyone can tell you that Xin Zhao is much more oppressive than Yi if he ever gets ahead. He has built in regeneration and CC; it will literally be case of him killing someone before the knock up wore off.

Shyvana has been a lackluster top laner for a while; however, as a jungler she has also been sporting an absurdly high win rate. The key to Shyvana's success in the jungle is her ability to counter jungle and blatantly 1 v 1 most junglers throughout the game. Take Yi against Shyvana, and see how often you can win in a duel. Granted, Shyvana is easily kited so the nerfs may be unwarranted. I believe that Riot is afraid of further buffing her dueling power and counter jungle potential to make the fight even more one sided than before.

1) the problem with devourer on YI is that it enables absurd dps with just devourer+BotrK, so he can go tanly afterwards with stuff like Quicksilver oer Banshies, makeing the 'just CC and burst him' argument void, as he can tank through the burst and itemize against the cc.
2), It's still no understandable that they nerf Ws base damage rather than removing the 20% bonus to monsters if jungle shy is a problem but lane shy isn't...
